core.​ XPS_typ_Exception

TypeDefinition

Authors

Crashdome

Description

HashmapObject which stores data about an error condition.  Typically is thrown using the throw command and possibly handled using try / catch

Parent

none

Implements

XPS_ifc_IException

Flags
Properties
Message
get "Message"

XPS_ifc_IException

Returns
String

A message about the exception thrown
